Ben Chambers

ben.chambers@dartriverlondon.com

Ben Chambers MBA, BSc, MRICS.

Qualified as a chartered surveyor in 1995, and worked for Gooch & Wagstagg, Nelson Bakewell Gooh Wbster and Fineman Ross predominately in Investment Agency.

Joined Great Portland Estate Pls in 2002 from Fineman Ross as an Investment Manager and was promoted to Investment Director and onto the 4 persons GPE Plc Executive Committee in 009 until he left the copany in 2016, to pursue a more entrepeneurial path.

Primary responsibility at GPE was the company's activity in the Investment Markets between 2002 - 2016 including but not limited to, the identification of potential acquisition opportunities, identifying and executing accretive business plans on assets, managing disposal and creating / managing Joint Ventures.

Ben sat on the board of GPE plc's joint ventures with the Liverpool Victoria Friendly Society, The BP Pension Fund and Scotish Widows.

Neil Thomson

neil.thomson@dartriverlondon.com

Ben Chambers

ben.chambers@dartriverlondon.com

In dicam luptatu
velim te omnis
patriotique.

Both served on GPE’s 4 member Executive Committee, Neil as Executive Director and Ben as Investment Director, with Neil also on the plc Board.

Prior to GPE, Neil was Investment Surveyor with Derwent Valley (now Derwent London plc) and Ben was an Investment Agent with Fineman Ross and Gooch Webster.

The core management has significant experience  as Investing Principals; undertaking close to 100 transactions, across 60 projects, creating and executing some of London’s most exciting and lucrative asset strategies over the last 20 years.
